idea:
Balcal Nutrefy is a Health & Wellness company partnering individuals, corporations and institutions with an objective of spreading awareness about “Right Nutrition”, thereby inspiring and enabling them to achieve optimal health.


We specialize in providing nutrition based advisory services, primarily focusing on Weight Management, Therapeutic Diets, Hospital Advisory Services, Corporate Wellness, Lifestyle Diseases, Kids’ Nutrition, Sports Nutrition & Women Health.
name: Balcal Nutrefy Diet Solutions Pvt Ltd

idea:
Futuristic Technology with affordability :Marshan brings tomorrow’s automation technology to your home and business today. We specialize in a variety of home automation systems, including Lighting Control, Audio and Video Control, HVAC Control, Security System Control, and the Ultimate Home Theater experience , Sanitary and Plumbing , Bathrooms , WiFi and Hi Tech Gadgets from Supply to Installation , Maintenance and Service Support.


Skilled and Customer Centric worksforce : ​Our highly skilled team has the expertise and capability to design and install a customized system specific to your needs and desires–whether it’s a retrofit project or new construction. Our service to our customers goes beyond the completion of a project. We are committed to providing unparalleled and ongoing support to our clients to ensure they are completely happy with the products and services they receive. That is the Smart Homes / Smart Offices way!

www.marshan.in
name: MARSHAN AAPYA PRIVATE LIMITED
